page.title: 14P.C. Stacey.
page.content: P.C. Stacey is our village policeman.He works from his Police House in Escrick,and patrols the 5 villages of Naburn,Stillingfleet, Riccall,Kelfield and Escrick.Village policemen used to walk or cycle round their beat,but now most have patrol cars. P.C. Stacey is usually able to decide for himself how best to utilise his 8 hours on duty.Teleprinters and radio convey information to him,and he visits the main station at Selby to collect his mail.Burglary is the most common crime in our area. P.C. Stacey enjoys the variety his job offers,also he prefers working in a rural community where he can get to know all the residents,both young and old.A village policeman is really on duty 24 hours a day,because he is always available to give assistance when required.
